select id, taskNo, taskName, schedulerRule, (case frozenStatus when 'FROZEN' then '已冻结' when 'UNFROZEN' then '未冻结' else '' end) as frozenStatus, executorNo, sendType, url, executeParamter, timeKey, FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(lastModifyTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastModifyTime from quartz_task_informations order by frozenStatus desc,lastModifyTime desc limit #{currentPage},10

select id, taskNo, taskName, schedulerRule, (case frozenStatus when 'FROZEN' then '已冻结' when 'UNFROZEN' then '未冻结' else '' end) as frozenStatus, executorNo, FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(frozenTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as frozenTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(unfrozenTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as unfrozenTime, sendType, url, executeParamter, timeKey, FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(lastModifyTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as lastModifyTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(createTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, (select FROM_UNIXTIME(FLOOR(executeTime/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') from quartz_task_records r where r.taskNo = i.taskNo order by executeTime desc limit 1) as preExecuteTime, (select case taskStatus when 'SUCCESS' then '成功' when 'FAILED' then '失败' when 'INIT' then '初始' else '' end from quartz_task_records r where r.taskNo = i.taskNo order by executeTime desc limit 1) as taskStatus from quartz_task_informations i where taskNo = #{taskNo}
select id, from quartz_task_informations where taskNo = #{taskNo}
select id, from quartz_task_informations where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
